# ImageAnnotationConstructorOptions

**Interface**

An object containing options for creating an image annotation.

## Declaration

```swift
interface ImageAnnotationConstructorOptions
    extends AnnotationConstructorOptions
```

## Initializing the image url

- **url**: An object containing URLs for the image assets in multiple resolutions.

## Creating an image annotation

- **new ImageAnnotation(location, options)**: Creates an image annotation with a URL to its image and a coordinate.

## Inherits From

- AnnotationConstructorOptions

items.description: An object containing URLs for the image assets in multiple resolutions.
items.name: url

items.description: Creates an image annotation with a URL to its image and a coordinate.
items.name: new ImageAnnotation(location, options)
